        public boolean moveLegal(int udlr,
                         int posX,
                         int posY)
        Method checks if movement in user's indicated direction is allowed.
        Parameters:
        udlr - the direction 1=up,2=down,3=left,4=right.
        posX - current x-coordinate.
        posY - current y-coordinate.
        Returns:
        true if move is allowed and false otherwise.
